snippet: An insurgent wearing an Afghan Army uniform killed a British member of the allied forces, and a member of the Afghan Army died in the gunfire that followed.
abstract: Insurgent wearing Afghan Army uniform kills British member of allied forces; international forces return fire, killing one member of Afghan Army.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Graham Bowley reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: An insurgent wearing an Afghan Army uniform killed a British member of the allied forces, and a member of the Afghan Army died in the gunfire that followed.

headline.seo: Afghan and British Soldier Are Killed in Attack
headline.main: Afghan and Briton Are Killed in Attack
headline.print_headline: Afghan And Briton Are Killed In Attack
